Set.Text: The city must possess an Arsenal before a Military Base may be constructed. [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Increases air unit capacity of the city from 6 to 10.[ENDCOLOR]
The Military Base is a mid-game building which increases the city's Defensive strength.

Allows airlifts to or from this city. 50% of the [ICON_CULTURE] Culture from World Wonders, Natural Wonders, and Improvements (Landmarks, Moai, Chateau) is added to the [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism output of the city. [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism output from Great Works +50%.
The versatile Airport is an excellent choice for civilizations that are trying to improve their [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism output or are land-locked and need to create city connections to remote cities.
